did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Warren H. Manning landscape architecture blueprints and drawings, 1903-1914.
did.physdesc: Blueprints, a sketch, reports, and plans.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two blueprints of a ground plan of a house and stable in Bar Harbor, Maine, 1903, a sketch showing proposed trails and planting along Six Mile Creek in Tompkins County, New York; reports and plans for Cornell University, 1910 and 1930; published report on a city plan for Birmingham, Alabama, 1919.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two blueprints of a ground plan of a house and stable in Bar Harbor, Maine, 1903, a sketch showing proposed trails and planting along Six Mile Creek in Tompkins County, New York; reports and plans for Cornell University, 1910 and 1930; published report on a city plan for Birmingham, Alabama, 1919.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Warren H. Manning landscape architecture blueprints and drawings, #43-2-1657. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Manning, Warren H. and Fleming, Bryant; Report: "Studies for Cornell University made with special reference to the location of the buildings for the College of Agriculture," Nov. 1910 (mimeo., 11 pp., blueprints - 3, photographs of drawings - 3)
Manning, Warren H.: "Suggestions for Tunnel and Elevators at Cornell," Oct. 31, 1930 (blueprint)

Manning, Warren H.; Report: Nov. 4, 1930 , 10 pp. (Original typescript and carbon copy, original copy has page 9 missing); also 2 maps, "Land Unit and Direct Ways, Apr. 3, 1930 (1 dyeline, 1 blueprint)
Manning, Warren H.; Report: "A Study of the Westerly Unit of Cornell University," Apr. 3, 1930 , 12 pp. (carbon typescript and xerox copy)
The City Plan of Birmingham, 1919 , published report, 47 pp.
Manning, Warren H.: Sketch for Development of Library Slope, Oct. 28, 1930
Manning Bros.: 2 blueprints (bad condition), Layout showing land and ground plan of house and stable for A.J. Cassatt, Bar Harbor, Maine, 1903
Manning, Warren H.: Six Mile Creek - sketch showing proposed trails and planting, 1914
Manning, Warren H.: "Studies for Cornell University made with special reference to the location of buildings for the College of Agriculture," Nov. 1910
